Class GameSave

    • import_export.GameSave
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Object
implements Serializable
    A class of object that can access all game saves.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSave

        public GameSave()
        Creates an object that saves and loads CAH_Games.
        Since:
        CAH1.0 Saves is set equal to saves = ((GameSave) in.readObject()).getSaves(); If saves is null, then a GameSave.NoSavesException will be thrown. Also an exception will probably be thrown if gameSaves.dat does not contain any GameSave objects. If an exception is thrown, it will be caught and saves will be initialized as a new ArrayList();.
